titles.title: Sea of Okhotsk Fisheries Enforcement Act of 1993
A bill to amend the Central Bering Sea Fisheries Enforcement Act of 1992.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13023)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings under the authority of the order of Nov 17, 93 without amendment. With written report No. 103-218.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 345.

bill.summary: 10/4/1993--Introduced. Sea of Okhotsk Fisheries Enforcement Act of 1993 - Amends the Central Bering Sea Fisheries Enforcement Act of 1992 to prohibit U.S. vessels and nationals from fishing in the Central Sea of Okhotsk except in accordance with an international fishery agreement to which the United States and the Russian Federation are parties.
